name: Ghost Town (itch) (Pixel Raven)
description:
Description

Interact with your environment to scare the townsfolk!

Scare everyone enough and they will be ghosts too!

Make everyone in town a ghost like you!

Controls

WASD to move

E to interact

Goal

Scare all the townsfolk to death! But avoid the ghosthunter!

The Ghosts That Made This!

Jimmy - Project Manager, 3D Artist

Joseph - Gameplay Programmer, Sound, 3D Artist

Rui - Gameplay Programmer, Effects

Stephen - Gameplay Programmer
